mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTALCOUNT , COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(M_DT,'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') THEN 1 END) AS DAYCOUNT , COUNT(CASE WHEN ACCT_TYPE_NO=6 THEN 1 END)ADMINCOUNT FROM M
SELECT QNA.QNA_NO, QNA.TITLE, QNA.Q_DT FROM ( SELECT QNA_NO, TITLE, TO_CHAR(Q_DT,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS Q_DT, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY QNA_NO DESC) AS RNUM FROM QNA WHERE DEL = 1 ) QNA
